snippet: Major equity indexes were almost unchanged as investors watched for clues about the budget talks in Washington.
abstract: Stocks are flat as politicians remain at odds about how to settle the looming federal requirements for tax increases and spending cuts.
lead_paragraph: Major equity indexes were almost unchanged as investors watched for clues about the budget talks in Washington.

headline.main: For Shares, a Flat End to a Rocky November
headline.print_headline: For Shares, a Flat End To a Rocky November
